# The `deferredval_ty` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Stores a reference to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, not the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; itself, thus can be used in commutative matchers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Stores a reference to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;, not the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; itself, thus can be used in commutative matchers.
